text:
The Employees’ Provident Fund Organisation (EPFO) has already allotted a UAN (Universal Account Number) to all the Provident Fund members.

A press release from C. Amudha, Regional PF Commissioner –II, Sub-Regional office, issued here on Saturday said that all the PF members henceforth should furnish their UAN while submitting / forwarding any claim forms or communication letter on or after January 1 to avoid unnecessary delay in settlement or redress of grievances.
title: UAN allotted to PF members
